lyric.verse: Totemo chiisana mado no soba de Bokura wa kogoeru egao no mama de CURRY no kaori wa kimi to onaji de Yasashikute chiisakute wasurete shimaisoo Tookyoo no fuyu wa kyoo mo samusugite MUFFLER wo kimi to onaji mi maite miru Sayonara aishiteru Sore kara mo kitto Wasurenai? Wasureru yo Kore kara mo zutto CURRY no kaori wa kimi to onaji de Yasashikute chiisakute wasurete shimaisoo
